name: .PXZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .PXZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open PXZ files with Pixlr X or Pixlr E (Web, Windows, Mac). To open a PXZ file in the web version of Pixlr X or Pixlr E:

In your web browser, navigate to https://pixlr.com and select either Pixlr X or Pixlr E from the website's menu bar. Novice image editors should select Pixlr X, while expert editors should select Pixlr E.
Navigate to and open your PXZ file.
You can also open PXZ files with Chasys Draw IES in Windows.

Since PXZ files are Zip-compressed, you can extract their contents with a Zip decompression tool. Corel WinZip (Windows), Apple Archive Utility (Mac), and B1 Free Archiver are several options for decompressing your PXZ file and extracting the WEBP images and other files it contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
